products.title: Splash Smokey Purple Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling splash range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish, the fabric offers wonderful light filtering properties in addition to this is also moisture resistant. This range of fabrics are the perfect choice for kitchens, bathrooms & en-suites. This dark smokey purple roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering properties meaning you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room.

products.title: Splash Smokey Purple 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their splash smokey purple vertical blinds are contemporary and stylish. A moisture-resistant dark purple fabric with a beautiful dark purplehue, makes this blind a great addition to a kitchen or bathroom. With a variety of control and stacking options available on their headrails, this blind can be easily tailored to work for any window. At swift direct blinds, with fifty years of blind making experiance, quality comes first.

products.title: Splash Smokey Purple Panel Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash smokey purple panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The rich purple panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm, saturated shade. As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,. 5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make. A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design.

products.title: Splash Sloe Purple Panel Blind
products.description: Their splash sloe purple panel blinds is a quick and stylish way to fill a space. This purple dimout fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space. Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe. As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with their 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.

products.title: Splash Sloe Purple Electric Roller Blind
